metadata.title: CVE-2016-0840 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: Multiple stack-based buffer underflows in decoder/ih264d_parse_cavlc.c inmediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-04-01 allow remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) viaa crafted media file, aka internal bug 26399350.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
